info.description:
========================
pytest-docker-postgresql
========================

A simple Docker PostgreSQL plugin to use with pytest.

----


Features
--------

* TODO


Requirements
------------

* TODO


Installation
------------

You can install "pytest-docker-postgesql" via `pip`_ from `PyPI`_::

    $ pip install pytest-docker-postgresql
